prix_site_web.question: How much does a professional website cost?
prix_site_web.answer:
The cost depends on project objectives, number of pages, and features.
On average, the price for a professional website ranges from ‚Ç¨800 to ‚Ç¨1800.
This includes responsive design, SEO optimization, analytics setup, and basic technical support after launch.

Free audit and detailed quote provided after discussing your project.

delai_creation.question: What is the timeline to create my website?
delai_creation.answer: The average timeline is 4 to 8 weeks depending on complexity. Showcase site: 3-4 weeks, E-commerce site: 6-8 weeks, Custom application: 8-12 weeks. We also offer an express service in 7-14 days for urgent projects. Detailed schedule provided upon quote validation.

services_agence.question: What services does your web agency offer?
services_agence.answer: We create and update websites, improve their speed, SEO, and conversions, and also ensure support after launch ‚Äî so your business grows online.

refonte_site.question: My site is outdated, do you offer website redesign?
refonte_site.answer: We will update the design, speed up loading, improve SEO and conversions. Prices starting from ‚Ç¨450, detailed quote after free audit.

maintenance_support.question: Do you offer maintenance and support after delivery?
maintenance_support.answer: Yes! We offer maintenance packages starting from ‚Ç¨49/month including: automatic backups, security updates, 24/7 monitoring, bug fixes, and priority support. Intervention under 2h in case of emergency. Your site remains high-performing and secure at all times.

visibilite_google.question: Will my site be visible on Google after creation?
visibilite_google.answer: Yes, all our sites integrate SEO optimization from creation: optimized structure, meta tags, XML sitemap, fast loading time, and mobile optimization. We also create your Google My Business listing and accompany you in your local referencing to maximize your visibility.

gestion_autonome.question: Can I manage my website myself after delivery?
gestion_autonome.answer: Absolutely! We use intuitive CMS (WordPress or custom solutions) with simple interfaces. Complete 2h training included to make you autonomous: adding pages, modifying texts/images, managing blog. Technical support available if needed.

consultation_gratuite.question: Do you offer a free consultation for my project?
consultation_gratuite.answer: Yes! Initial 30-minute consultation FREE to analyze your needs, define the optimal digital strategy, and propose concrete solutions. Competitive audit and personalized recommendations included. Book an appointment now without commitment.
